# Use this VS code template to create new exam page

```json
"Exam Template": {
  "scope": "markdown",
  "prefix": "exam",
  "body": [
   "# ${1:examName}\n",
   "## About the exam\n",
   "## Learning resources\n",
   "## Bookmarks\n",
   "## Tips\n",
   "### Tip #1\n",
   "### Tip #2\n",
   "### Tip #3\n",
   "### Tip #4\n",
   "### Tip #5\n"
  ],
  "description": "Markdown snippet for exam page"
 }
```
